### TOTAL NUMBER OF ARTICLES: `r nrow(Private)`

### Publication Language

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dotchart(colSums(PubLangGrid))
kable(data.frame(colSums(PubLangGrid)))
kable(prop.table(data.frame(colSums(PubLangGrid))))
```

### Type of Publication

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dotchart(data.matrix(table(Private$PubType)))
kable(data.frame(table(Private$PubType)))
kable(data.frame(prop.table(table(Private$PubType))), digits=2)
```
